# Architecture Overview

## Introduction

<!-- High-level description of the {{repoName}} architecture. -->

## Principles

1. **Simplicity** — Prefer the simplest solution that meets requirements.
2. **Modularity** — Components should be independently deployable and testable.
3. **Observability** — Every service must expose health, metrics, and logs.
4. <!-- Add project-specific principles -->
